title: Thieves is the only way to GO.
text:
Anything with original Thieves Oil is A-OK with me.
I cannot tolerate most smells or synthetic smells, but all natural Thieves smells delicious.
I often put a drop of the oil under my nose when I am going to be around sick people or traveling.
A must if you are going to be flying on a plane.
I Also put a few drops in a fine spray bottle of cheap Vodka to use as air freshener or on linens.
Oil mixes better with an alcohol base.
There are knock off of these products around, but they are a waste of money.
Only original Thieves via Young Living is the way to go. Love I can get them Prime via Amazon.

title: Tasty Coffee Drops in a Tin
text:
We love coffee in our house so when I was presented with the opportunity to try these coffee drop candies in a tin I couldn't pass them up. You get 3 cute little tins full of the candies and each had a freshness seal around them. The tin was easy to open, there were no sugar pieces from the coating that fell out, and each tin had 21 pieces in them. I found the size of the coffee drops to be quite adequate, not too small and not too big. I saw where a couple people thought they were huge but they're about the size of a jelly bean but not as fat. They have a smooth coffee flavor with some sugar added in to make them the perfect little sweet. I found them to be very tasty and enjoyable. One candy at a time is plenty for a treat. They arrived in a cute black box that makes them perfect for gift giving and the tins are the perfect size to put in your purse, pocket, desk drawer, end table or pretty much anywhere else that you want to tuck away some coffee sweetness. We thought these were so good that we're going to try one of Cavendish & Harvey's variety packs next.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review. However, that doesn't mean that I just automatically gave it a high rating and made up a review. All statements made are based upon my experience with the product as I always use each product for a period of time prior to leaving my comments in order to assist future purchasers.

title: Eh...
text:
Okay I'll give pros and cons:
Pros:
1. You can control the temperature very well
2. It heats up fast
3. The barrel shape makes it easy to curl even curls
4. Packaging was good

Cons:
1. The placement of the buttons are in the way of how to grab the device, so when you are using it you easily turn it off in the middle of doing your hair. The buttons are so slight that you don't even know you've turned it off or changed the temperature. Very annoying.
2. The iron pulls on my hair, I don't have damaged hair so it's not because of that. My other iron doesn't pull on it and I think I may go back to my old iron soon because of this problem.
3. And this isn't a big deal, but the hair clips that come with it are terrible and useless. Very cheap and don't hold the hair very well at all. So don't count on using them is what I am saying lol!

title: Shampoo bars for the win for travel!
text: I was quite skeptical about a shampoo bar. Would it lather? Would it leave my hair smooth and shiny? We were trying different brands for an upcoming trip and I am now a shampoo bar convert! It is as good or better than shampoo in a bottle and for travel, there is no question it is the best choice. We bought two different bars of Garnier. The scent was lovely, and the lather exceeded my expectations. My husband said he rather use a shampoo bar from now on. The only thing was the length of time it lasts. It is supposed to last a lot longer than it actually does. For a trip it would be great for a week. If two people are using it, that would be all it would last. title: Does nothing. A poor conditioner. False marketing claims.
text:
An unremarkable conditioner. The name-brand conditioners work better and cost much less. This Foamiest product does nothing to thicken hair. It does not work well as a conditioner. None of the ingredients are associated with reducing hair loss. The three peptides in this product are
sh-Oligopeptide-1,
sh-Oligopeptide-2, and
sh-Polypeptide-3.
There are some peptides associated with hair health, such as GHK-Cu and TB-500, but this product does not contain those peptides. To my knowledge, there is no evidence that the ingredients in this product do anything for hair health. I searched online for any scientific studies and could not find anything, or even any theoretical benefits. I could also not find anything in the popular hair loss discussion forums. The manufacturer is making false and misleading claims to push their overpriced product. They are also making false claims about what caffeine does, such as saying that it suppresses DHT, which it does not do.

title: Too hard to use
text:
I am surprised this product worked. It does what it claims to do. It gave me a realistic-looking tan and that tan withstood multiple showers and cleaning wipes. The tan looks like I spent the day in the sun, rather than dark brown or orange.

The problem with a product like this is the color contrast with the places you do not apply this to, or if you miss a spot, or if you have thinning hair. It can go on blotchy if it is not applied evenly. Some parts of the body might become darker or not absorb this as well. Making it appear smooth is a challenge. Also, where do you stop applying this to your body? Wherever you stop there will be a contrast with the untanned skin. One particular problem is your hairline and scalp. I have thinning hair, so the contrast between a pale scalp and a tanned face looks odd. This is a challenging product to use and I wouldn't recommend it unless you are already used to using sunless tanners.

It is not greasy, it did not stain, and it dried quickly. The ingredients seem healthy for the skin. There is no smell to the cream.

title: Firmer Than Other Heads
text:
Compared to my regular replacement heads, these heads feel much firmer and more stimulating to the gum. They also snap more firmly to my brush than do my regular heads and run more quietly.

If I had to choose between the two, I'd choose my regular head first. Because, however, I've already bought these and they may have some beneficial effects the regular heads lack, I've chosen to alternate the heads. I use one head to clean my teeth with baking soda, then floss, then use the other head to brush with toothpaste.

I've now been using this head for two months. It only took a couple of days to get used to the stiffness and I wouldn't even notice it if I wasn't alternating the heads. I see no evidence, however, that it cleans any better.

I've done the acrylics and gels, but hate how they damage your actual nail, or have to keep going back to the salon.
I love how inexpensive these little guys are! I don't feel bad about changing them out after awhile and trying a new set. The adhesive glue on the back is flexible, but holds super well!! I love how even once they are old, they don't just pop off!
I have pretty narrow nails, so I need to file down the sides on some of them before applying, but you definitely want them to fit right otherwise they won't stay on as long. If they are too wide, the edge will left up eventually. Otherwise, these will last two weeks easy!
I think they're adorable, and got major compliments on them. People are always amazed when I tell them they're press-on. :)

title: I like it. . . with a couple of "issues"
text:
First of all, there is a sticker over the charging lights, so you will want to remove that.

My shaver came pre-charged, which was nice.

Speaking of charging, one thing this shaver is missing is a cradle for charging. You have to plug it in. Not that big of a deal, but it would have been nice to have a cradle.

Overall, it's a very nice shaver. It's comfortable to hold, and smooth. No ‚Äúpulling‚Äù of hairs. It has two shaver heads. A lot of the less expensive models have only one. I haven't had any issues with ‚Äúloose hairs‚Äù either ‚Äì hairs that it doesn't cut.

I like that you can wash it with water.

For the price, I don't see that much difference between this one and a couple of the other Wahl models, which are lower in price.

One thing that this one is missing. . . a way to ‚Äúlock‚Äù it for travel, so that it will not accidently turn-on when something presses against it. It really should have that at this price.

Though of course you never want to get anything like this in your eyes, but I found that this burns more than most other products I've used. I usually use this in the shower and other products if I'm simply washing at the sink.

title: Wonderful manly smell
text: Soft not overpowering smell.

title: AHHH.  INGENIOUS PRODUCT
text: Excellent product.  Body wash works great with these, you no longer need a wash cloth, or back scrubber.  We wash ours in the washer with the towels and hang to dry.  Last forever.

title: Best Tanner
text: I've been using this tanner for a couple of years and I love it. Easy to apply, no smell and a great color overall. Would recommend.

text: These are üëçüèº

title: In Love with this one
text: It's awesome, I totally live how it makes my skin so soft. I use it most days since receiving it.

title: Thumbs up
text: These work pretty well for the occasional breakout. I just pop one on my newly formed pimple and presto overnight or about 8 hrs down the line it's less red and definitely almost gone. Just need to be careful taking it off the plastic, very sticky and it can mess up how flat it goes on.

title: Just don't like the front
text: Very pretty and soft

title: Wonderful
text: More than I expected and exceeded my expectations.

title: Great for Dematting
text:
I've got a huge black russian terrier. His hair gets matted pretty easily and I was having a hard time in the past with other tools. Even the furminator couldn't handle his matting. This tool wad a shot in the dark. Lower priced and worked fantastic. It sheds and dematts
Working like a charm for my large breed. Takes a little work but it's effortless. My only wish was a larger tool for larger dogs. This one does the job but it could cut my time down a bit if it was bigger.

title: Perfect blend of boar and nylon bristles
text: This brush has the perfect blend of boar and nylon bristles. It's gentle on your hair while also pulling out the tangles. It does a great job of distributing oils so your hair is shiny and smooth. This brush is very nicely made. It's solid, lightweight and comfortable to hold. Highly recommend it.

title: Love this!
text: I've had a few nail drills in the past but they were uncomfortable to hold and/or didn't work very well. With the world being so messed up right now, I decided to try again and pick up this drill since my nails are in dire need of some TLC. I am so glad I took the chance because this thing is great! It's super comfortable to hold and has just enough weight to it to feel balanced without tiring your hand. The cord isn't super long but there's enough length to give you some freedom of movement. I do recommend starting on the slowest setting until you're comfortable using this because you could easily damage your nail bed if you aren't careful. There are attachments for every step of the process, whether you're doing acrylics, gels or cleaning up your natural nails. This is a great little device that really lets you take at home nail care to a new level.

title: Wonderful product!
text: Amazing quality and perfect size for all my cosmetics. Will likely be buying a second to accommodate my growing collection.

title: Definitely Works
text: I really like the Braun Silk female epilator. Does remove the hairs while being a bit painful it really does the job. Time taking but the result is worth it. Super epilator.

title: Superb Soap Sheets
text: Love these Tirtyl soap sheets. Of the many necessities I carry in my purse I love to have the soap sheets. Often when I am out and about there is no soap in the bathrooms. These soap sheets really fill the bill. The sheets are all scented and lovely but I really love the jasmine and patchouli. What a delightful scent. The sheets soap up nicely and I am really pleased with them. Great addition to purse necessities.

title: Delightful Scent
text: I absolutely love this Calendula soap with coconut oil. The scent is so light. The bar is relatively small. My skin feels so good and refreshed when I use this soap. My skin tends to be dry and this soap works so well for me. Love it.

title: Perfect!
text: These strap extenders are perfect. I don't mind wearing a mask. I wear one at my part time job and when shopping. However most of the ear straps are annoying and either pinch the back of my ear or make me look like Dumbo. Anyhow these strap extenders take the pressure off the back of my ears and are easy to set up. Super product.

title: Great Toothpaste
text: Colgate Total Advanced Deep Clean Toothpaste, 7.6oz is a super product. It makes my teeth feel super clean and I like the taste of the toothpaste. Twice daily brushing makes my teeth look great.

title: So far I am pleased with this set, having sensitive skin, it works for me
text: First, this Beard Growth Kit, 10 In 1 Beard Kit For Men with Beard Oil, Beard Balm, Beard Conditioner set offers a nice number of items if you are considering a gift this holiday season (or any time). It's a nice box, again, offers a good number of items for a gift, and is done nicely enough in box set up and presentation it would be well received. Second, the items in it are a good range of ‚Äúquality‚Äù so I think it'll be appreciated. What I am saying: the brush, comb, bag, scissors, and guard are decent, but not great quality. You can get better quality, but for working needs and for a gift, this is pretty good. But, for example the scissors feel a bit cheaper. But they will get use as long as they cut well enough. I'm not big into using a guard, but this one is like others I've had. The included bag is decent, but I'd never use it; if traveling or moving my stuff I'd use a toiletry bag. The brush is not as nice as others I have, but it's useable and gets the job done. Same with the comb. That brings us to the shampoo, Conditioner, and oil. NOTE: I have extremely sensitive skin, so this review is based on my experience from that standpoint. I like a range of scents or items to keep my beard in good shape, but I have a far more difficult time finding things that work and are okay on my skin. I have only used these items once, but that's all it takes to know. I come away happy - they all worked and NO reaction. I used the shampoo and conditioner in the shower today and they not only had a nice, light scent, but I was bale to let it sit on the beard for a few minutes each, having no issues with skin and liking the smell. The beard felt soft following and I liked how they worked overall. Next, the oil. I believe it is claimed to be used for ‚Äúbeard growth,‚Äù and maybe it'll help with that. My beard is decent, but I do have spots that could use thickening, so again, I keep an eye open for options. However, there is no way to know if it'll work for that for a few weeks if not months. So until then, it again did fine on my skin - not a single ounce of negative reaction. The sect is light, so it's nice to smell, but one (my wife) has to get up close to smell it. I do like it that way, so it doesn't bug my sinuses or overwhelm. In the end I'm very happy so far with this Beard Growth Kit, 10 In 1 Beard Kit For Men with Beard Oil, Beard Balm, Beard Conditioner set and happy I grabbed it. I'll use it and if all stays well, would consider getting it again.

title: So far this is working well for my sensitive skin; will see how it goes in the long run
text:
First off, I have extremely sensitive skin overall, but especially on my face. To that end, I must be very carefully about what I put on. I do tend towards lighter or no scents, but have found some that work alright for me. But with or without scent, I can still have issues. In the end, it's how my skin handles anything that is the bottom line for me. In this case, this Provence Beauty Beard Oil - All Natural Fragrance Free Olive, Sunflower & Jojoba Oils works well for me and so far, I'm very pleased.

I use a derma roller a couple times a week to help with hair in my beard and front of my head. At this point I then add a beard oil to these locations to help stimulate growth. Without doing major testing with all the elements, like a control group (area) of my head, it's hard to say what works and what doesn't. I feel like the derma roller has a large part in how well growth or at least slowing of loss goes. But, I have also come to believe some of these oils available do play a supportive role. To that point, I won't be able to speak about this Provence Beauty Beard Oil - All Natural Fragrance Free Olive, Sunflower & Jojoba Oils for awhile. I have only just begun to use it - as a replacement for another oil.

But I do like that 1. it's not too oily on my hair or skin, 2. has little to no real scent, 3. feels fine and is not a problem on my skin, and 4. that it washes off my hands easily post application. Right now I like it as an oil providing at least some softening to my beard. Will it aide growth? We shall see...

title: I really wanted to like this and I do, except, my sensitivities can't take it
text:
I will fully admit up front, I have a very bad sensitivity to scents. In my years of life I've only found maybe half a dozen I can put up with. I usually avoid them - but because I enjoy them - I do try to find ways to use it. Because of these sensitivities I try not to ‚Äúblame‚Äù the product, unless it burns - then I have to question what all is in there. In this case, I decided to try Atlas Semi Matte Texture Putty 2.4 Ounce is a Medium Shine because of other reviews - I was hoping... but sadly, nope, I can't do it. So I'm giving it 4 stars 1. because I do like the smell, but 2. it lasts far too long, smelled like it got stronger than lighter, and in the end, was too much for me. I got the Atlas Semi Matte Texture Putty 2.4 Ounce is a Medium Shine and both my wife and I liked the smell, but immediately worried it would be too much based on first sniffs. I put it on, and it worked great. It's easy to put on - only a small amount covered my hair easily - and smelled nice. It was easy to work with my hair and it looked great. But as time went on, this Atlas Semi Matte Texture Putty started to smell more and more and more. The smell did not dissipate, but grew. And my head started to really hurt.
In the end, I do like this Atlas Semi Matte Texture Putty 2.4 Ounce is a Medium Shine for how it works and how it looks. But for sensitive guys, you need to be aware, this putty has a strong scent - in my case at least, too strong. I won't be able to keep using it.

title: It's a decent idea, it worked, but not with the included suction cups
text:
I drive my wife nuts when I trim my beard in the bathroom - I try to catch all the clippings, but without something like this, it does not work well. I thought I‚Äùd give this a try - it seems like a great idea, but...

1. It arrived with 1 plastic bib, 2 suction cups with hooks, and 1 shaving cream brush.
2. The plastic bib feels okay - it's a thin plastic, but it should last for a decent amount of time. It is not as nice as most of the kinds I've experienced or we own for haircutting
3. Its stitching is okay - I think it'll last decently
4. There are two loops on the ends you will attach to the suction cups.
5. The suction cups - are worthless. This is why it gets the 4 stars - I would have given it 3 stars if we didn't have our own suction cups to use instead of theirs. One of the two that came with it stuck for 5 - 10 seconds before it stopped working altogether. The other suction cup doesn't even look right - it looks like it never worked and was not made properly.
6. We have suction cups (bought on Amazon) we were able to use - I looped that part of the bib onto them, which worked, but not designed for this, they would fall off. I'll end up taping them to it - at least that way I'll be able to use it.
7. It fit me fine. It felt fine - just like a haircut cape. The white looks weird - I'm used to the far more common black - but at the same time I think it'll show the beard hair really well.
8. I did notice that as I go in closer to the mirror to see what I'm doing it folds over in front of me and isn't as trapped out - be aware of this because it's easy to start missing the catch in the bib.

Overall it's a decent thing to have and it'll make my wife happy not getting the beard clippings all over the place. This could be a little nicer - a little thicker plastic, much better suction cups - which would easily earn it a 5 star rating. But for what it is, I'm happy to have it. If it lasts, it'll be great.

title: Not Bad
text: This is the second set of different colors of this brand I have purchased and they are decent nail polish.  The colors go on strong and go good with nail art.  There is a bit of a funky odor but it's nail polish so you would expect an odor.  It did not take long to dry and the colors are great.

title: Beautiful
text: This Kissio 9 eye-shadows pack is really nice! But the fun part is watching the shadow holder spin in circles in your palm. Once you open it, the spinning stops. So fun! There's 9 gorgeeeeeeeous sparkly colors to wear. I'll probably wear the majority of them over time. They're really nice and super easy to apply! Now that I'm retired, I don't wear makeup everyday so this pack will last me a long time. The shadows look nice and stay on for quite awhile before melting in the 90+ degree weather that were experiencing which created a drought here. But these eye shadows will definitely brighten up your day! I like them!

title: A Very Versatile Mist Spray Bottle
text: These Scoot just spray bottles are fabulous for many uses. Most people use them for spraying beauty products, plants, hair spray, etc. However, I ordered them for my artwork to spray watercolor paint, inks, and acrylics. What I love about them is the fine mist and that you can see what product it contains. Also, once filled, you can turn the lock so there's no leaking. A very versatile plastic water spray bottle!

title: LOVE this perfume!
text: This Dance Midnight perfume by Shakira is really luscious and sexy! It has a strong floral and musk scent which is a heavier scent. It's very mysterious and breath takingly good. I love it! Even the bottle is sexy. It's a heavier scent that I usually love to wear during fall and winter. In spring and summer I will wear a lighter floral scent. I've worn this perfume 3 times now and get compliments each time. Usually from my husband too. I love this perfume!

title: Not very sparkly
text: The rhinestones in these "flowers" don't catch the light very well, so only one really looked sparkly in the light.  Each clip has a bottom, 3.75" long clip (with about 3" of that for holding hair) with three 1" long clips (with 0.75" of that for holding hair) attached to it's top. The springs are strong, so they'll hold hair well. However, they're so strong that I have difficultly working them on my own hair. The "flowers" are also felt or some kind of stiff cloth glued to the plastic clip, so the "flowers" may come off with use.

title: Works to dry drippy hair faster after a shower
text: The package contained 3 microfiber Towel Wrap Turbans: one pink, one lavender, and one striped (orange, pink, blue, white). They are 26" in length. After a shower, I've wanted to wrap my long hair up in a towel for a while because otherwise it drips down my back as it dries. But I've never mastered getting a towel to stay in place. This product does help: place the large "hood" section in place on your head, tuck your hair into the tail then twist the tail one or two times, and secure the elastic loop over the button. It stays in place okay as long as you don't try to pull a shirt on over it (or similar activity). I put it on for about 20 minutes after my shower, and the Wrap is pretty wet when I take it off. My hair's still damp, but it dries much faster after that and doesn't drip down my back. So it works.

title: A Winner!
text:
If you're looking for wooden paddle brush for long, fine hair, then this one may be just what you need.

This brush is well constructed. It's made entirely of bamboo (the handle, body & bristles). However, the bristles are smooth. This results in a very sturdy brush that can easily work through tough tangles, but without causing unnecessary breakage.

And the price is right (under $8.00 with Prime at the time of this review).

If there's any downside then it would probably not the best brush to use on wet hair with a blow dryer because it's not designed for air flow.

However, if you're looking for a good, sturdy paddle brush to use on dry hair, then this is the one for you.

title: Not Really Sure Who This Brush Is For
text:
While this is a nice looking & seemingly well designed brush, I'm not really sure who it's best suited for.

My wife has been in search of a brush for fine hair. And while this brush is described to work on fine hair, it barely even brushed through the surface of her hair.

The bristles are so soft that it can't really grip. So just kind of glides over.

It may be useful more as a beard brush, but unfortunately, that's not what it's being sold as.

Giving it 2 stars for being a well made brush (wood handle is very nice), but just not very useful for its intended purpose, brushing!

title: Dependable Mary Kay.. at a good price
text: Dependable product from Mary Kay.  I was tempted to save money for a cheaper product, but after 20 yrs and many compliments, I will stay with this product.

title: Well made and versatile
text: If you want to take a simple outfit to the next level, this is a quick and easy way to do it. They can be pinned to a jacket or blouse, and there is also a thick elastic band so that they can be added to a ponytail. They also look nice on some purses. They are stiff so they can handle storing several in one container. Some of the petals are made of a sheer fabric and others are opaque, which adds interest to the look. I have many of these in different colors, and I enjoy wearing them often.

title: Adds a little extra to any outfit.
text:
These flowers feel stiff and so they aren't easily crushed and bent out of shape. They have a pin for wearing on clothing, and a thick, sturdy covered elastic for wearing with a ponytail.
I have several colors that help me add just the right amount of interest to several types of outfits. I've received many compliments while wearing them.

title: Not the best around
text: Not as expected

title: I have brunerr hair (with gray n it) but my eyebrows are a different thing
text: I'm just missing, thick eyebrows - I do have hair, but you an see through them...not enough hair.  This kit helps me feel as if younger than my 65 years!  Pick an eyebrow "style," use the frame and included pencil and I have eyebrows again!

title: If you have patches of coarse hair now that you are older...
text: My grandmother had issues with patches of dark, coarse hair on her face/chin area as she got older and apparently I have genetically inherited that problem.  Therein lies the problem with using this appliance.  I must shave before using this thing and then I get to be "pinched" over and over on that sensitive skin where I just shaved...I mean, if you find something hurting you, do you go back to it willingly?  No...at least when I let the stubble get long enough and then wax, the pain from yanking that wax off is much faster and less painful that this light-pulsing machine.  So, that said, it's just not the way to get rid of hair for me.  If I had just a few hairs in one spot, maybe, but not the way the hair grows on my face/chin area.

title: Oh the uses for glycerin
text: This bottle I bought to put a scant teaspoon into my home made ice cream to keep it from forming ice crystals after storing in the freezer.  I just bought a Cuisinart Ice Cream Machine and followed a simple recipe for chocolate ice cream, but I wanted to make sure that it would not become hard and full of ice crystals once I stored it in the freezer, so I did some research online and glycerin is one of several ways to keep ice cream creamy.  It only takes a teaspoon in the recipe and the other thing about glycerin is that it is sweet, so it blends in well with an ice cream recipe.  My ice cream turned out great and it is smooth and creamy after being in the freezer.  Now, this is not my first use of glycerin as I have used a small amount in water to spray in my hair.  Especially on really humid days when my naturally curly hair turns into a frizz-ball, spraying my hair with a 10 parts water, 1 part glycerin (or even less glycerin, depending) keeps my hair from frizzing out so bad.  For me, in ice cream or in my hair, glycerin works great!

title: I got this bag for foot issues
text: I do suffer from some foot issues and use heat/shiatsu massage on my feet for circulation issues, but these salts are for relieving pain when dissolved in very warm water in my foot bath/massager.  Okay, news-flash, I am a senior and not as active as I used to be but I am also very aware of keeping good circulation in my feet and making them feel as good as possible - arthritis in several joints means if I can lessen pain anywhere, I'll do that and my feet are important.  I can truly say that these magnesium salts really do make my feet feel so much better when dissolved in the foot bath water.  Because of my knees, I don't take baths any longer, but if I could easily sit down and get back up in the bath tub, I'd definitely try these salts in a nice long soak in the tub - I can imagine my whole body feeling as good as my feet afterwards!  Considering the amount I use in my footbath, this is not a bad price at all either.  When I use up this bag, I will be buying it again.

title: Just what I needed for my old furgirl
text: I have a rescued teacup poodle that is a frightened little diva when I try to groom her.  I don't think the people who took care of her were nice or gentle with her in any way.  Poor little thing is only 4.5 pounds and she's fairly old and toothless so it's not like she'd turn and bite anyone trying to keep her looking like the pretty little girl she is.  I got this brush for her fine, curly hair.  She is a sweet little girl, but will "bleat" if she thinks you intend to hurt her and the first time I put a brush to her, she was shivering like I was going to do something bad to her.  I talked to her and took my time and by the time I was done, she was relaxed and let me work on her a little at a time.  My other furgirl is an older, rescued papillion and because her fur is straight with no undercoat, this brush works great on her.  She doesn't mind the brush at all and I think she likes how it lightly "scratches" her skin at the same time. Great brush for my two old girls!

title: My first time using a detangling brush
text: I have curly hair - very, very fine, but curly hair.  Because my hair is so fine, I cannot use traditional combs or brushes when my hair is either wet or dry.  I mean, all I have to do is one "flip" or have the wind move my hair once and the knots are there.  For many years, after shampooing my hair, I used a very wide pick to comb through my hair.  Even with a pick I have to go slowly since I will find at least one knot in my hair.  Anyway, this is my first time using a detangling brush and it's not a bad deal.  I still have to go slow, but I like how it goes through my hair more fully than the pick.  Definitely worth a try if you have curly hair!

title: What a great set for my grandchildren
text: I remember my own children when they were small and how difficult it can be to ensure they all brushed their teeth at least twice a day - and spent a reasonable amount of time doing it.  I don't try to interfere with how my son raises his children, but I gave this to him so his kids, my grandkids, could have the potential for better hygiene than my kids had.  I have a similar one that I use myself and think this irrigator is a great way to ensure that they get good reports when visiting the dentist.  Great price for this small, portable unit that comes with its own travel bag.

title: I had originally thought I might give this as a gift
text: But I had to open it and spray some on my hand...and that was it.  I love the deep, spicy-sweet scent of this perfume.  It was a few hours before bed when I sprayed this and when I went to bed, I had my arm up near my nose - oh, it smelled so good and helped me relax and fall asleep!  Okay, so maybe that's not what you think of when looking for a great new perfume to wear, but it's not that it made me sleepy - it's just that it smelled so good I relaxed quickly and that allowed me to fall asleep.  This would have been a great gift for one of my daughters in law, but no...I can't give it away!  If you like that deep, spicy-sweet scent of certain perfumes, try this one.  So worth it!

title: I have tried the drills that have batteries in the body of the drill
text: And while they don't seem to be bad, they just don't have the power that this one does.  I'm thinking it has to do with the size/strength of the battery in the drill's attached power supply.  While I do use this for my fingernails, I am using it more for my toenails and feet.  Toenails are thick and tough and I have trouble cutting them well even with good toenail clippers so being able to file them a little at a time is much easier.  Also, I have some very hard, thick skin on my feet and "grinding" that skin down is much easier that using a foot file.  This is a wonderful nail drill that's not just for nails - sturdy like a workhorse, it will make short work of messy nails or hard, callused skin.

title: I took a chance, but again, I was wrong
text: See, I have naturally curly hair.  The issue is when the weather is very dry over a few days' time, my hair goes flat.  Curly hair curls a LOT in humid weather; hence, the frizz which we deal with!  Anyway, I saw these and thought that maybe during those really dry winter days these would assist me in getting my hair to curl as it should.  Now, the problem is, curly hair "fights" with some hair items - from my younger years my sisters used bristle curlers (they had straight hair) but the first time I tried using them, my hair like BIT INTO those bristles and man, I nearly had to cut my hair off to get those demon curlers out of my hair!  These are similar, apparently to the bristle, demon curlers as they grabbed a hold of my wet hair and when I tried to pull one off, even holding onto the hair at my scalp, I could feel the tube holding onto my hair for dear life.  That was with WET hair...I'm glad I did not wait for my hair to dry before attempting to pull the tube off!  I have several friends with longer, straight hair and I'm sure they will have a different, happier and more comfortable experience than I did.  What I'm saying is that I'm sure they work - for those with straight hair.  If you have curly hair, best be careful when using them!

title: Works well for what I need
text: Yeah, I have a physical job that requires I wear a mask while working.  I work in an non-air-conditioned warehouse so I sweat...having a headband that can catch some of the sweat trying to drip into my eyes helps, but now with having to wear the mask, having the buttons on the headband allows me to combine the two instead of having to try to hook the mask's elastic behind my ears and then pull the headband over my ears and getting it situated on my forehead.  Life has changed and finding the best way to work with the new normal is the only way to go...and this headband is working for me - maybe it will work to make it easier for others!

title: I don't have "broken" hair
text: But I have baby-fine hair that is also curly.  I always have hair around the hairline that will NOT lay flat or blend into the rest of my hair whether it is pulled back or down.  Oh, and don't even get me started on humid/rainy days.  Curly hair, especially baby-fine curly hair, frizzes like crazy in humidity.  So yeah, I could spray the crap out of my hair with hairspray and have one great helmet head with not a hair out of place, but I absolutely hate hairspray.  Besides, that would require washing my hair every time I coat it with hairspray - the problem is baby-fine, dry hair isn't made to be washed daily.  So...I have lived with all those crazy "free-wheeling" hairs until trying this product.  It worked so well I was amazed and it did not leave my hair feeling like a hair helmet!  I used the mascara-like wand around the hairline from one ear to the other and those little hairs stayed in place!  Cool beans!  I will buy this again, definitely.

title: I decided not to cut my hair this summer
text: Usually I get a "summer cut" so that my hair doesn't make me any hotter during the summer months, but with the pandemic and all the salons closed, my hair is going to stay long over the hot summer months.  I can do many things with it and one is to keep it away from my face with these headbands.  I like the colors and the headbands themselves hold firmly in place which is just what I wanted.  I have some that had a twist in them and for some reason, they don't hold in place on my head very well like these do.  Colorful, comfortable to wear, and keeps my hair back - that's all I can ask for!

title: This is an all-inclusive package for those wanting to get into gel nail polish
text: I mean, you aren't starting with tons of colors or anything, but when you are new to gel nail polish, keeping it simple is the best way to begin the process.  The two colors are nice, but I am sure once a person starts gel polish, they will love it and buy a set of colors that suit them.  Now, the only thing I would change about this set is the UV light as it is very small.  I already had a larger one and am comfortable using my big one as I can fit all four fingers under it with ease.  Not that I have fat fingers or anything, but I just feel the included UV light is a tad smaller than most women would like.  Other than that, this kit will get absolutely anyone started properly in the gel nail polishing procedure.

title: I've been using this a few days
text: And it is working to soften up my feet.  As a kid I used to walk around barefoot outside all the time.  Asphalt in summer does things to your feet...so over the years I've had problems with calluses built up over time.  I put this on my feet and went to bed the first night.  Put it on again in the morning and have been doing that regularly over the past few days.  It does soften the hard, dry skin on my feet.  The scent is a bit funky - eucalyptus and menthol are not my favorites, but considering it is my feet...I can handle that.  Good cream for feet!

title: Love all the colors
text: I have very, very fine but very curly hair and am always trying to tame some little wisp of hair that refuses to stay in one place.  These clips are about the only type of clips that work well in keeping my wispy hair in place for any length of time.  The only thing that was a problem with these is that the side of the plastic these came in had torn and they were all over the shipping box.  I mean aaalllll ooovvvveeerrr inside the shipping box.  What a pain to pick all of these up...but I believe I got them all.  I do love these little clips and love all the bright colors that I can use for spring and summer.

title: I bought this and another set for my niece to put on me
text: My niece is a professional and this is my way of getting professional work done without paying what she makes at her shop!  Of course, she does stuff like this for me and her mom (my sister) every once in a while when we ask!  So I got this and another tray for her to put on me and this tray was not really appropriate for my eyelashes - they were just a bit too thin to use on me.  The other tray worked much better so next time I will not get this set.  I'm hoping she can use it on another client of hers...might work for others, just not for me.

title: Followed the instructions above and got great results
text: I think part of it is choosing a good black under polish prior to adding the mirror powder as it needs that dark base to really shine and look like chrome.  I chose the dark blue to try first and it looked stunning when done!  The part I hate with gels is getting them off, but I'll work on getting better at that.  I love the tangerine chrome powder and will be trying that next!  These are gorgeous colors and I will be trying each of them in turn.

title: I haven't worn the pearl-covered ones
text: But I have worn all the rest!  I love how these look on my head and they do a great job of keeping my hair back from my face when I'm working around the house.  I mean, I've used scrunchies to pull my hair up on my head, but after a little while that hurts my scalp.  These are gentle on both my hair and my scalp and they do look good (at least to me) on my head!

title: It does work...maybe not as well as they would like you to believe
text: Trying to get this right is the problem - it's an issue that can't be glossed over.  If you can do it right, it looks nice, but the chances are, you will move along your eyebrow with this "pencil" and it will look goofy.  I don't mean that you shouldn't try if that's what you want, but I'd rather just have a regular eyebrow pencil.  That is easier to use and generally produces decent results for me.

title: These are nice for keeping hair back and look good doing it
text: I like having longer hair, but unless I braid it every time I want to do some work (or pin it up), it gets in my way.  I mean, if I'm trying to move a chair from one room to another and when I lean down to grab the chair, I also get a handful of my own hair which also covers my face blocking my sight.  Like my hair, hate that it gets in my way.  I have a few different things - scrunchies is one, but sometimes I don't want to wear them...so, I got these headbands for an alternative and they work great!  They keep my hair back just enough so I can work without it getting in my way.  These twist headbands also look pretty while holding my hair back.  Worth a try if you also have hair that sometimes gets in the way!

title: Sweet Orange is amazing!
text: Liquid body washes are my favorites, but some seem to dry my already dry skin out so that right after my shower, I have to slather on lotion to keep my skin from feeling tight and dry.  Not so with this one!  First, it smells so good - love the orange scent that envelopes the shower!  Second, a small dollop on my scrubby lathers up well and cleans thoroughly without having to add any more to the scrubby (like other body washes).  Last, when I step out to dry off, my skin feels hydrated and soft.  I really like this body wash!

title: Not just for little girls!
text: I have very, very fine hair - meaning that each strand of my hair is exceptionally thin/fine.  I have a LOT of hair, but because my hair is so fine, I have trouble with wispy strands  coming loose at the wrong places.  These type of clip work really well to keep my wispies corralled.  Granted, these are very brightly colored, but I have a few of the kind that blend into my hair.  What I was looking for was something that coordinated with what I was wearing so that I could "celebrate" my hair with the bright colors of these clips.  I mean, why hide "difficult" hair issues?  Or maybe hiding it in plain sight when wearing a Christmas-y red dress with red hair clips!  If you have wispies that escape and make your up-do look messy, maybe you too could try bright clips to celebrate your wild and crazy hair!

title: Straight razor with a "guard"
text: That's basically what this is.  First off, the box is written in Chinese, I believe, with absolutely no English on it.  No instructions other than a pair of pictures.  Not great pictures either.  Not to be deterred, I opened the box, pulled one of the razors from the box, removed the plastic cover and tried it.  If you look closely at the one picture, you will see what appears to be a drop of blood - it is.  That is why I described this as a straight razor with a guard in quotes.  Make NO mistake, these are SHARP.  Use them delicately and only on smooth skin.  If you have a blemish, a mole or anything just slightly raised on your skin, it will be cut off.  You will bleed.  Just want others to be aware of what this is and to take care not to hurt themselves.

title: Great quality

title: It' Pretty Good
text:
Saw this puppy discussed a lot on various shaving sites. They all said that you have to watch the YouTube videos to get the right technique for lathering. I watched a couple and have been trying this now for the past several weeks. I must have tried close to 40 different soaps, creams and sticks from the most expensive to the not so expensive. This one is right up there in terms of face glide and lubrication.Certainly in the top quintile. Why 4 stars? I have tried every variation to get a lather but there is no getting around that this is the most difficult soap I have ever tried. Too much water, too little water it seemed impossible to get it right the first time. No matter what I tried it seemed to either be too foamy and thin or not enough water to generate a lather. It's as if the gremlin in the soap puck was contrary enough to defeat whatever I tried until the 2nd or 3rd try.
Bottom lime- With effort and persistence it gets the job done and the fragrance is mildly pleasant but it will never be my "go-to" product. I'll stick with may favs: Kiss My Face, Cella and Proraso cream.
UPDATE:
Gave it another try with a little more patience. It seems that the end product you want is a little on the thick creamy side and not really a "lather". If you wet your brush, turn it over and let all the water drip out that you can,then you apply brush to soap and be patient and determined you will get the thick rich cream that will do the trick. One other tip I found after you apply the cream to the face let it sit for about 20-30 seconds before you apply your razor. You will then get the greatest glide you will experience. Accordingly I have moved it up the top tier and displaced the Proraso cream.I would give it 4 1/2 stars, and not 5, if I could because of the difficult lathering.
FURTHER UPDATE
After using this puppy for a little while I have come to master it and love it. Great for glide and closeness and absence of irritation. I originally rated it a 4 but now after careful consideration I must admit that it deserves a 5 star rating. Its among my top 3 favorite shaving products.

Everything is very mildly scented (a mix of fresh & floral), but not overwhelming and the scent doesn't stick around. The No Pore-Blem primer is nice and works well to smooth out specific zones on my face, but I don't use it all the time. For all over coverage, I prefer the Priming Water, followed by the Prime Essence, which makes my skin look and feel great, and helps my foundation look awesome.

My hair has a mind of its own, so I have to keep it straightened. It is pretty light weight and I really like the black color with the rose gold accents.  It heats up very fast and really left my hair smooth and silky. So far I am very happy with it and to me the true test will be when I go overseas. As you can see in my picture it has an infrared light strip in the center of  the straightener.

title: GREAT GRASP ON MY HAIR
text: My hair is fine and I have a hard time finding hair clips that keep my hair up, usually my hair slides right on through and falls down. I am very happy so far.

title: LEAVES HAIR SOFT & SHINY
text: I had bought myself a  heat cap for my hair because my hair is dry and it has really been thinning since I started becoming middle aged. My sister gave me this deep condition protein  hair mask a few months ago to try. I have been using it once a week and my hair is definitely a lot softer and shinier. The one thing that really sticks out is the smell, it is very pleasant and not over powering.

title: HEATS UP VERY FAST & WORKS GREAT
text: I can't believe how fast this flat iron heated up, it was like instantly. It has a nicely lit LCD screen. All the buttons are on the inside, which is good since I usually hit the controls on my hair curling wand because they are on the outside. The temperature is adjustable, I only needed it about halfway since I have a finer hair. It does come with a heat resistant glove, instructions and a carrying case/ storage bag. There is a little loop on the cord so you can hang it and the cord also rotates so it doesn't get all tangled up.

title: LOVE THAT THEY DON'T PULL MY HAIR OUT WHEN I TAKE THEM OFF

I really like how these hold my long hair snug in a ponytail and they don't pull on my hair when I take them out. I love the colors too, teal and black are my favorite colors.

title: SOFT, SHINY & SMOOTH HAIR
text: My husband and I are getting ready to take a trip abroad. I was worried about what I would use on my hair, because it has a mind of its own. He surprised me and bought me this flat iron for our trip since it is dual voltage. I have thin hair, but I have a lot of hair and with this having temperatures from 230 to 450 degrees I usually only have to set it at 350 for my type of hair to get it straight. It have a very nice LCD display that is very easy to read. This is a 1 inch ceramic tourmaline flat iron. It worked great in my hair making it very soft, shiny and smooth and it was done very quickly. I also like that it has an auto shut off, since I can easily get distracted. It comes with a very pretty satin drawstring bag, that will be great for putting it in my luggage.

title: Grandma Agafia Shampoos are GREAT.
text:
Have been using the "Grandma Agafia" product lines for a few years - they are superb.
The aromas are not overpowering or objectionable, and all of the ingredients are natural.
I am an over-60 male with advanced male-pattern baldness. If it were not for these products, I am sure I would be slick-bald by now.
When I started on the propolis formula almost ten years ago, I WAS slick bald on top. A month of using the shampoo and my scalp started sprouting "peach fuzz" hair - not a full recovered hairline by any means, but it showed that the shampoo was doing its job of cleaning the scalp and supporting follicle health.
I have much less breakage, and the hair I have left retains its thickness and diameter.

title: Didn't work for my iPad but it is a good device
text:
I bought this to provide in-wall power for my 2nd generation iPad (30-pin connector). The kit comes with all the connectors pictured; you supply your own CAT-x cable for the Connection between the power supply and voltage regulator. Before putting it in the wall I set it up with my iPad and charging cable and found that it wouldn't charge or even power the tablet. The USB jack has only the power wires connected but nothing on the data lines, so neither the iPad nor my iPhone 6+ would recognize it as a charging supply. I could I'm sure modify the connector or make my own adapter but I ended up abandoning the project in favor of another solution because I needed it working within a couple days.

Build quality seems fine, it does what it says though the Ethernet pass-through port is only 4 wires so it can only carry 100 MBit data.

title: Just the perfect size & weight for my purse
text:
Evolve Boar Bristle Purse Size Brush
I needed a new brush for my purse & now I have one! Just the perfect size & weight for my purse. Lightweight yet sturdy. No plastic! This brush would also be perfect for a toddler's hair or an elderly person's thin hair. No sharp edges to poke you!
I have never had a boar's hair brush so I suppose there is a bald boar running around somewhere! Not in my neighborhood, I hope!!
I just hope I don't lose this brush! I have a hard time keeping brushes. Usually, I lose them. Sometimes my cat decides he likes my brush, so I give in. He needs to stay out of my purse!
I'm hoping this brush works out. Then I will graduate up to the larger sizes. I think the plastic brushes are rough on my hair & pull some hair out.
So far, I'm loving this brush. It really smooths & tames my hair down If you want a natural soft brush, this is the one for you. I don't use this brush on wet hair. I switched over to a wide tooth comb. My plastic brushes are in the trash!!
I did receive this brush at a reduced cost for an honest opinion. I love it! Thank You!!

title: ... from Smooth N Clear How can this actually be fun? Well
text:
Callus Remover from Smooth N Clear
How can this actually be fun? Well, not fun-fun, but interesting. I can't believe how much dead skin comes off while you are "sanding" your feet! It is amazing!
No amount of foot scrubs or using the little egg with blades could do better. This Callus Remover is so easy to use. When I am finished using this remover, I admire & touch my feet - then I put lotion or vaseline on & then some white socks. I wear the socks overnight. In the morning, my feet are so soft & free of dead skin & any beginnings of calluses. Easy! I don't use the remover every night, just maybe once or twice a week. Maybe, skip a week. So it doesn't feel like just another chore.
This Callus Remover comes nicely packaged & you get a cleaning brush & 2 rollers. I just wish I knew where I could get some extra rollers. I feel the machine itself might outlast the 2 rollers. If I find some rollers that fit - I'll update my review.
I did receive my remover for a reduced cost for an honest opinion. Thank You!!

title: All natural Luxury
text:
I have never used a bath bomb, mostly I have used bath salts and made my own bath treatments, but had heard so much about bath bombs that I wanted to try them out for myself. I use essential oils so this one looked especially good to me. There are no funky ingredients or chemicals in it, so that was a huge plus for me. Each of the bath bombs has a name and what it is for. My favorite right off the bat was the grapefruit for energy. I was having a tired day and needed a pick me up, so I took a hot bath with one.

The bath bomb took a while to dissolve, so it lasted quite a while, then the water turned lightly colored. It was nice to feel on my toes as it dissolved. The smell was lovely, however it didn't last too long. On the next one I used I just dropped a few drops of essential oils that matched the scent, so it helped it stay scented longer.

All in all it is a lovely luxury to pamper yourself or give as a gift.

title: Keeps the skin soft and smooth
text:
Scrubs are a nice way to get rid of dead skin, so this seemed like a good way to go. It isn't full of a bunch of chemicals and is similar to a salt scrub. It's not all wet, so don't go wiping it on your face without first getting it wet. The best way to use it, in my opinion, it to take a little pinch/scoop of it and add it to your body scrubber. I think an electric face scrubbing brush is fine it you have shower doors or a shower curtain to keep any pieces from flying all over, but this helps get the scrub really worked into the skin. You can also use it on a body sponge/wash cloth or even with your fingers.

It doesn't have a terribly strong smell, it's actually quite mild, which is fine because you don't always need to smell strongly with purfumes and fragrances. Over all it's a good scrub and works well for what it is used for.

title: Nice mirror for make up
text:
I have never been the type of girl to stand in front of a mirror and do make up for long periods of time. I have used a hand mirror for years, I prefer to sit somewhere like a bed or couch and do my make up. Using a hand mirror is harder though because you then only have one hand to work with the make up. While I don't do a ton, opening things like mascara or doing eye liner is a lot harder when you only have one hand.

This mirror stands up on it's own, so you don't have to hold it. It has a pretty red exterior and it even lights up. The light is not a really bright one, but enough to light up your face if you are in a room that is not as bright as you would like. The rim lights up on both sides, the regular mirror side and on the zoomed in mirror side. There is a place to plug it in, but no plug, so you can choose that option if you have a plug. I used the 3 AAA batteries that it came with. It works well for me to be able to do my make up without having to stand in the bathroom and I don't have to hang onto a hand mirror.

title: Very high quality and professional set
text:
There are so many uses for tweezers, and I am used to having some from brands like Revlon and such that are okay, but they are not very high quality. The ends are usually dull and they have a hard time grabbing anything. I was extremely happy when I opened this pack of 3. They are a sturdy stainless steel metal, no plastic or cheap aluminum. The ends of the silver one are extremely pointy, perfect for pulling out things like splinters and anything that might get stuck in the skin. My husband was working and ended up with a large splinter under his finger nail. Since you can't exactly get it from the top, we decided to use the silver sharp pair of tweezers and were able to extract the splinter from under his nail. They also work very well for removing hair. I pluck from time to time and the black and pink pair are really nice for that. The silver is easy to get out any ingrown hairs. Overall the set is very high quality and very professional.

title: Forget mixing up a powder, this is so much better than that
text:
No one tells you when you are young that your face will break out even as an adult. Especially when things are stressful or it's just that time of the month. I had some friends tell me that mud masks are especially helpful for this, but that they are also good for exfoliating and keeping skin healthy. I tried using some bentonite clay as it says you can use it as a mud mask, but it ended up clumpy and hard to spread on my face. I always ended up making too much too, which only wasted it. It was too much trouble and I stopped using it. I decided to give the dead sea mud mask a go. It is much darker than I expected, my entire face was blue/grey. It's very easy to spread on, I just used one finger and small swisp on each section of my face. It doesn't take too much, I figured it would take a big scoop, but really it took much less. I have used it three times already, each before bed, and you can't even see a dent in how much was in the jar. I left it on about 10 minutes each time and then wiped it off with a wet wash cloth. My skin feels softer, is not breaking out, and my husband even noticed a difference.

title: It actually detangled my extremely thick hair
text: I have very thick hair, for a long time I had a mat of tangles at the base of my skull that used to take me up to an hour to detangle. My hair was getting unmanageable so I cut it off. After donating 4 pony tails to locks of love, as my hair reached all the way down to my knees when I was standing up, I thought my hair would be easy to care for. But if I'm not careful, I still get very bad tangles in my short hair. Now that I am starting to grow it out again, I thought my troubles would be back, but I received an opportunity to try this brush at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest, unbiased, review. (all opinions are my own) I took my hair down from it's ponytail and ran the brush through, figuring it would get caught fairly quickly. To my surprise, it didn't really snag at all. It actually did as it claimed. My hair was smooth and the spot at the base of my skull that always gets missed no matter how hard I try, was also smooth and untangled. I am really shocked. I have tried so many brushes for myself and had sort of given up on finding something just for me. I will be keeping my brush in a safe place so my kids don't lose it and recommending to all of my friends. I am very happy with this purchase and would buy it again. It is worth the money.

It can also be used as a scalp treatment to absorb oil, dirt, sebum and cleanse and clarify hair. No natural beauty tool kit should be without this fabulous Ghassoul Paste.
Moroccan Ghassoul, also known as Rhassoul Clay lessens dryness, enhances skin clarity and elasticity. It's known to clears pores, reduce stubborn blackheads and tighten skin resulting in a general smoothing of the surface skin. A lovely ochre colored clay with a silky smooth texture, mined in the Atlas Mountains of Morocco, this extraordinary mineral-rich clay is known for its unmatched ability to absorb impurities from the skin. It cleanses deep, clearing pores and tightening skin without harsh scrubs or chemicals.
I have been using this paste and see such wonderful results. I plan to use this for a long time to come, this is something that needs to be a staple in all of our homes. I am so happy with this.
I purchased this product for a reduced price to make an honest and unbiased review.

title: Good cream but more like an oil
text: This anti-age cream is a good product, but it's more like an oil than a cream.  It is moisturizing and works well for that purpose.  It's a little messy since it's more of an oil.

title: Good instructions but didn't work for me
text: The Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum Cleaner just didn't work for me.  I did like the directions for the product which were easy to follow.  The device has different settings with a light to indicate what suction setting you are on which is a very nice feature.  The device just did not remove my blackhead.  The USB charging cable that comes with the device was very short and did not come with an adapter to plug it into an outlet so I had to borrow an adapter to charge it.  I like the silk bag that it comes with for storage.

title: Pretty soft color.
text:
I love this soft pink color. Perfect for a light makeup.
It run smoothly on the lips, I do use a primer before because I have very dry lips.
It last at least all morning and then all afternoon.
Even if the color is soft, the lipstick have a good pigmentation.
No weird scent.
I like it!
Recommended.

title: Super soft and shinny hair
text:
This is a great option to the expensive hand tied extensions, plus you can put them in and off when you want.
The hair is soft and shinny, feel very good quality. It hold very good straightening or curling iron.
The weft has clippers so it can be more secure to the head. And the wire is adjustable to the size and shape of your head.
It is not extremely heavy, but you can feel it when you first put it on, but after a couple of hours you don't even remember is there.

Comfortable to wear, the weft is not itchy.

title: Chocolate scent‚Ä¶ huge bottle
text:

Although my hair does feel softer and shinier. But I don't have a ‚ÄúBrazilian straight‚Äù.

title: Definitely not for every night
text:
I wanted to love it, but i just can't.
It smell good, it spread easily. You don't need too much of it for the entire face. My skin did feel moisturized after using it BUT i just can't stand the stickiness!!!! I tried with several amounts of it and i could not sleep at all because of the sticky feeling. It was too much. It did not absorb into my skin. Obviously every skin is different, mine is sensitive and dry.
The consistency is like a heavy gel.
So, for me is a BIG no, but i will use it during summer after sun tanning, before shower. I can see that would be best for me....i even think it will work great if i storage it in the fridge before using it... just like a cooling gel.

No strong scent.
It did not make my skin red or itchy.
Love it! Recommended.

title: Great set!
text:

The clips are bigger than I was expecting, but they are perfect. I have very thin hair and medium length.
I like that they lie flat on my head. So they don't hurt me if I'm using them for long periods of time.
Lightweight and well made. They feel sturdy.
The set also comes with hair ties, love them! Very soft. They are made on 1 piece of fabric which helps on the hair.
I really like this set.
Recommended.

title: Mmmmm Im not sure...

First it does not have any √°rgan type of scent... on the contrary it smells like fried oil. Not good. It is not super strong scent, but definitely you can smell it.

text:

Like it. Beautiful!

title: Works great!!
text:
First of all, I don't use to much makeup, no thick layers of foundations. Just some primer, concealer, eyes and mouth.

I have mixed skin and delicate. They did not hurt me, burn me, or leave my skin red.

And they come in a super handy little box, perfect to carry around on your bag.

title: Fun and works great!
text:
I love this set! Even though I don't need 6 of them.

Comfortable to use, it does not squeeze the head. But it holds all the hair back.
